actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to provide grants to States to establish positions to minimize administrative burden on families seeking child care assistance.
short_title: Improving Early Childhood Data Systems Act

summary.text:
Improving Early Childhood Data Systems Act

This bill provides grants to states to improve the data systems that assist families seeking child care assistance.

titles.title: Improving Early Childhood Data Systems Act
Improving Early Childhood Data Systems Act
A bill to amend the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to provide grants to States to establish positions to minimize administrative burden on families seeking child care assistance.
